files.README.md:
# flo-llm-tools

Shared LLM tooling for FloSports projects. This repository contains MCP servers, Claude Code skills, hooks, and plugins that can be used across different projects.

## Installation

### As Claude Code Plugin (Recommended)

```bash
# Add the FloSports marketplace
/plugin marketplace add flocasts/flo-llm-tools

# Install the tools plugin
/plugin install flo-tools@flo-llm-tools
```

### MCP Server Only (npm)

If you only need the MCP server without the full plugin:

```bash
npx @flocasts/flo360-mcp setup
```

Or manually add to your Claude Code settings (`~/.claude/settings.json`):

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "flo360": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["@flocasts/flo360-mcp@latest"],
      "env": {
        "FLO360_ENV": "staging"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Directory Structure

| Directory | Purpose |
|-----------|---------|
| [mcp-servers/](./mcp-servers/) | MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for AI assistants |
| [skills/](./skills/) | Claude Code skills (markdown-based prompt templates) |
| [hooks/](./hooks/) | Claude Code hooks (shell commands triggered by events) |
| [plugins/](./plugins/) | Broader plugin packages |
| [docs/](./docs/) | Documentation and guides |

## Available Tools

### MCP Servers

- **[flo360](./mcp-servers/flo360/)** - Query Flo360 API for sports data (events, teams, participants, etc.)
